name: A Knight's Job
description:
The idea behind this game is that a corrupt king rules over the land and you must venture forth to defeat him. Beware, for there is more than just the king to worry about.

I recommend that when playing this game you use a controller as the keyboard controls are a bit janky at best.

Controls: Keyboard

  • Arrow Keys - move
  • X - attack
  • Z - Use
  • C - Roll
  • Up - jump
  • Hold up to use ladders
  • Hold down to pass through platforms

Gamepad:

  • left stick - Move
  • A - Jump
  • X - Use
  • Right Bumper - attack
  • Left Bumper - Roll
  • Hold up to climb ladders
  • Hold down to pass through platforms

General:

  • F - fullscreen
  • esc - exit game
  • R- Restart game

All of the music was provided by incompetech and is listed below: https://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/music.h...
